skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.
A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.localised_description: So stunning is Nastasya's visage that few dare to strike it.

Banished into exile by a cold and unfeeling monarch, Nastasya was forced to watch her confederates succumbed to famine, fever or some starving beast of the forest until she alone wandered the northern wastes waiting for the Death Crone to claim her.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% when fighting against Kislev.
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Kislev.
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This obsession with murder is just cheap, mindless bloodlust of the basest kind. To the servants of Slaanesh, there's so much more to life… and to death too, of course.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Khornate factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Khornate factions

skillTree.localised_description: This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Any victim that comes into contact with the wielder of this staff is confronted by their darkest emotions, amplified to the point of madness. Only the most valiant of heroes can fight on when assaulted by their deepest fears.

This evil artifact radiates an aura that fills all who see it with the desire to own it - at any cost. In battle Nastasya will casually toss the globe into an enemy unit who immediately fall on each other in a frenzied struggle to possess it.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Slaanesh has greatly enhanced Nastasya's sorcerous skills, enhancing them even further when mortals fall beneath the Dark Prince's sway.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

skillTree.localised_description: For N'Kari, and other intrepid disciples of Slaanesh, His temptations truly know no bounds...
Wrapped in glistening silver skin with the resilience of iron, Nastasya has a beauty that only Slaanesh may grant.
Nastasya's powers of persuation are far greater than even she first suspected, and now Slaanesh has enhanced them to prey on the weak minded.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Activates automatically when conditions are met

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Lash of Slaanesh"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Lash of Slaanesh Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Lash of Slaanesh Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Acquiescence Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.localised_description: This adept uses the Winds of Magic to seek out arcane artefacts.

Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Slicing Shards Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Slicing Shards Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Phantasmagoria Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

target_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Power of Darkness"

A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Even the Children of Slaanesh can be inspired to ever greater depths of depravity.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Forsaken of Slaanesh, Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The warriors of Slaanesh waste no time in hunting down their victims, for the heady delight of the kill is as addictive as it is exhilarating.

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Atop their powerful beasts of Slaanesh, the Seekers dart across the field of battle, cutting through their foes with devastating precision.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: There's little to do against the advance of a bladed chariot but to be ground beneath its heavy, bloodstained wheels.

Melee attack: +6 for Seeker Chariots, Chaos Chariot, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Seeker Chariots, Chaos Chariot, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The minions of the Dark Prince carry out frenzied slaughter in his name. Their victims' abject despair is but a delicious feast for their master.

Charge bonus: +12% for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Marauder Horsemen and Fiends of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Marauder Horsemen and Fiends of Slaanesh units

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +18% for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Marauder Horsemen and Fiends of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Pleasure and pain sit on either side of a fine-edged blade, and the greatest of Slaanesh's servants delve eagerly into both extremes.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Keeper of Secrets, Chaos Warshrine of Slaanesh and Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Keeper of Secrets, Chaos Warshrine of Slaanesh and Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Keeper of Secrets, Chaos Warshrine of Slaanesh and Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The endless pursuit of hedonistic delights further corrupts even the most depraved of creatures.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh, Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The true veterans of battle exude an aura of rapturous fulfilment, dulling the senses of their lessers.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Knights of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Knights of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Knights of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The kiss of a lover, or the kiss of a blade – the decadence's Devotees will have you begging for both!

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Marauder Horsemen and Hellflayers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Marauder Horsemen and Hellflayers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Marauder Horsemen and Hellflayers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: There is no end to the power a being holds once it can tug at your wildest fantasies and twist your darkest fears.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Soul Grinder, Chaos Warshrine and Keeper of Secrets units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Soul Grinder, Chaos Warshrine and Keeper of Secrets units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs Infantry: +7 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Soul Grinder, Chaos Warshrine and Keeper of Secrets units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."
The Perfect Prince can never have too many Devotees. It matters not one jot to Slaanesh whether they come to him willingly or are coerced into His worship.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: Having given itself willingly to the service of Slaanesh, this force requires neither the carrot nor the stick to fight for Him though either one would no doubt be pleasurable!
Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Prince of Pleasure whispers in the ears of all, pulling at the threads of their every deviant desire.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Nastasya dreamed that she had escaped from Kislev's palace and was pursued by the mad-eyed Katarin. Katarin then slew Tzar Bokha with her magic sword Fearfrost. Nastasya believed herself to be the daughter of Tzar Bokha because of this constant vision that haunted her. And therefore she believed that she had as much right to the throne of Kislev as Katarin.

effects.description:
Allegiance points gained: +100% for alliances with Kislev
	(factionwide)
